rocky.teatime.helpers

Class AlertHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocky.teatime.helpers.AlertHelper

  • public class AlertHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing some useful methods that help with things like creating alerts

    • Method Detail

      • createOKAlert

        public static void createOKAlert(java.lang.String message,
                                 android.content.Context applicationContext)
        Creates a simple alert displaying the message. Will likely be moved to it's own class later on.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display with the alert

      • createActivityKillAlert

        public static void createActivityKillAlert(java.lang.String message,
                                           android.app.Activity activityToKill,
                                           int exitCode)
        Creates a simply one button alert. When the user acknoledges it, they will close the activity and it will return to the last activity on the stack with the correct return code.
        Parameters:
        message - Message we wish to display to the user.
        activityToKill - Activity we desire to terminate
        exitCode - Exit Code communicating the status under which the activity has terminated

      • createServiceKillAlert

        public static void createServiceKillAlert(java.lang.String message,
                                          android.app.Activity applicationContext,
                                          android.content.Intent serviceIntent,
                                          boolean killActivity)
        Creates an alert which can be used to destroy a service corresponding to the supplied intent.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display in the alert.
        applicationContext - The context of the application when it calls this method!
        serviceIntent - An intent corresponding to the service we wish to destroy. It would be the same intent supplied when originally starting the service
        killActivity - If true it will also kill the parent activity
